title: Clank Proteo and Thererec: Infinite Waveforms
description:
Clank Proteo is a stereo oscillator that morphs between sine waves and an incoming sample signal.
Thererec is a proximity-based modulation source. Together we can make infinite waveforms.

Thererec: https://www.clank.eu/thererec
Proteo: https://www.clank.eu/proteo
